methods.name: AddWidget
methods.doc: Adds it to the game's viewport.

methods.name: AddWidgetForPlayer
methods.doc:
Adds the widget to the game's viewport in the section dedicated to the player. This is valuable in a split screen
game where you need to only show a widget over a player's portion of the viewport.

methods.name: GetWidgetSlot
methods.doc: The slot info from previously added widget or info that is store for later.

methods.name: IsWidgetAdded
methods.doc: @return true if the widget was added to the viewport using AddWidget or AddWidgetForPlayer.

methods.name: RemoveWidget
methods.doc: Removes the widget from the viewport.

methods.name: SetWidgetSlot
methods.doc: Update the slot info of a previously added widget or Store the slot info for later use.
